pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Added a simple link/joint list to the palette

content.raw:
I added a parameter to `jointInsert` which is a the unique Id besides the name, so the joint name can be passed without the need to strip `_HOTSPOT_` form it.

Also explicitly called the hotspot name a unique Id, as it is used to select joints with mouse clicks.

Links still work with names only for now, no "unique ids" since their names are not editable yet.

d80c239, 5581c15
